name: reldvds

stmt.origin: relopabi(hs0, hs1, cdvds, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wrex(hs2, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))
stmt.pretty: relopabi(hs0, hs1, cdvds, ((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℤ)∧ ∃(hs2 ∈ ℤ,(hs2[×]hs0)= hs1)))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdvds)
-| wceq(cdvds, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wrex(hs2, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cdvds)
-| wceq(cdvds, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wrex(hs2, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdvds, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wrex(hs2, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cdvds)
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(||)
⊣ d(hs0, hs2)
⊣ d(hs1, hs2)

comment: The divides relation is in fact a relation. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Jan-2020.)
